title: Mixtape Game: Jergens Doesn't Want to Team Up with Porta Potties
description:
Jenny hosts Mixtape Game this week! 

1. Give me a song that is either motivational as a whole or has a really good motivational line in it. 
2. You're the creative director for the new Jergens hand lotion commercial.  Tell me what is going to be happening in that commercial and what song plays in the background.
3.   You have the super power to be invisible for the day.  What are you doing with this Super Power and what song plays as your theme music while you sleuth around unnoticed.
